references.paper_title: Segmentation of multivariate mixed data via lossy data coding and compression
references.reason: This paper is foundational in the field of subspace clustering, providing a framework for segmenting high-dimensional data by representing it using a union of low-dimensional subspaces.

references.paper_title: Sparse subspace clustering: Algorithm, theory, and applications
references.reason: This paper introduces sparse subspace clustering, a highly influential method that leverages sparsity constraints to effectively cluster data points lying on a union of subspaces.

references.paper_title: Oracle based active set algorithm for scalable elastic net subspace clustering
references.reason: This paper presents a novel algorithm for elastic net subspace clustering that offers better scalability, efficiency and theoretical guarantees compared to previous methods.

references.paper_title: A geometric analysis of subspace clustering with outliers
references.reason: This paper provides a robust theoretical framework for analyzing subspace clustering in the presence of outliers, offering valuable insights into the performance and limitations of subspace clustering methods.

This paper proposes a neural network approach to address the challenges of nonlinear manifold clustering, pushing the boundaries of manifold clustering research by combining deep learning with manifold learning techniques.
